roleset.name: learn, absorbing information
roleset.note: LEARN-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls learn-14-1, learn-14-2-1, and discover-84. (from learn.01-v)

example.name: learn an NP
example.text: He-1 was shocked, associates say, *trace*-1 to learn of Mr. Icahn's new takeover threat.
example.arg: of Mr. Icahn's new takeover threat

example.name: learn an infinitival S
example.text: Apparently they are learning to say no to excess risk.
example.arg: to say no to excess risk

example.name: learn a finite S
example.text: Mr. Birnbaum recalls that [Mr. Guber and Mr. Peters]-1 shifted into high gear a few years back upon *trace*-1 learning that they had competition for the story of the murdered naturalist Dian Fossey, which became ``Gorillas in the Mist.''
example.arg: that they had competition for the story of the murdered naturalist Dian Fossey, which became ``Gorillas in the Mist

example.name: include WH-complementizers!
example.text: Kenneth Mitchell, director of Dow's polyethylene business, says producers-1 were surprised *trace*-1 to learn how much inventories had swelled throughout the distribution chain as prices spiraled up.
example.arg: how much inventories had swelled throughout the distribution chain as prices spiraled up

example.name: it-support
example.text: Meanwhile, in another sign that a new bid isn't imminent, it was learned that the UAL board held a telephone meeting Monday to hear an update on the situation.
example.arg: in another sign that a new bid isn't imminent
that the UAL board held a telephone meeting Monday to hear an update on the situation

example.text: John learned his lesson from Mary.

example.text: At my parent conference, his teacher told me that the only problem he is having is with his learning the letters of the alphabet.
